meanings.definition: A principal taxonomic category that ranks above class and below kingdom.
meanings.sent1: There are many different phyla in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the characteristics of various phyla to understand biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The phyla at the zoo had a meeting to discuss their classification.
meanings.sent4: In the tree of life, each phyla is like a branch representing a different group of organisms.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the different phyla can help us appreciate the diversity of life on Earth.

meanings.definition: A group of related organisms classified together.
meanings.sent1: The marine biologist identified a new phyla of jellyfish in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The phyla of insects includes beetles, butterflies, and ants.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the guests dressed up as different phyla of animals.
meanings.sent4: The phyla of plants in the garden formed a beautiful tapestry of colors.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the various phyla helps us understand the interconnectedness of life forms.
